DECLARE @roleID INT SELECT @roleID=ISNULL(b.Id,0) FROM dbo.accountinfo a left JOIN (select * from Roleinfo where BeLock=0 ) b ON a.RoleId=b.Id WHERE a.id=#{accountId}
IF @roleID>0 SELECT amc.id , MenuId , ParId , MenuName , ISNULL(Url, '') AS Url , amc.isButton , amc.BeLock FROM MenuInfo amc ( NOLOCK ) JOIN RoleAuth aam ( NOLOCK ) ON aam.MenuId = amc.Id WHERE aam.RoleId = @roleID and amc.BeLock = CAST(0 AS BIT) ELSE SELECT amc.id , MenuId , ParId , MenuName , ISNULL(Url, '') AS Url , amc.IsButton, amc.BeLock FROM MenuInfo amc ( NOLOCK ) JOIN AccountAuth aam ( NOLOCK ) ON aam.MenuId = amc.Id WHERE aam.AccoutId = #{accountId} AND amc.BeLock = CAST(0 AS BIT)

SELECT * , -1 AS accoutid FROM MenuInfo a WITH ( NOLOCK ) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT b.MenuId FROM AccountAuth b WITH ( NOLOCK ) WHERE b.AccoutId = #{userID} ) t ON a.Id = t.MenuId where a.BeLock = CAST(0 AS BIT)
SELECT *,-1 as accoutid FROM MenuInfo a WITH ( NOLOCK ) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT b.MenuId FROM RoleAuth b WITH ( NOLOCK ) WHERE b.roleid = #{roleID} ) t ON a.Id = t.MenuId where a.BeLock = CAST(0 AS BIT)
SELECT Id,ParId,MenuName,BeLock,Url,IsButton FROM MenuInfo with(nolock) where ParId=#{parId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and BeLock = CAST(0 AS BIT)
SELECT Id,ParId,MenuName,BeLock,Url,IsButton FROM MenuInfo with(nolock) where Id=#{Id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
